thread.title: Khloe Kardashian's parents inspired her to give back - but 'it doesn't matter if you give $10 or £10million'
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian's parents inspired her to give back - but 'it doesn't matter if you give $10 or £10million'

author: Vicki Newman
title: Khloe Kardashian's parents inspired her to give back - but 'it doesn't matter if you give $10 or £10million'
text:
Khloe Kardashian says her parents inspired her to give to others Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Khloe Kardashian says her "compassionate" parents made her realise how important it is to give back to those less fortunate. 
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star admits she grew up in a "blessed environment" but says that has spurred her on to help others. 
She says it doesn't matter if you give $10 or $10 million - but that being there for someone in need is what really matters. 
The reality babe says her parents, Kris Jenner and the late Robert Kardashian, were "very compassionate and giving" but also taught her and her siblings about the "realities of life" despite their great upbringing. Read More Khloe Kardashian says it doesn't matter how much you give to others, just that you do (Photo: E! Entertainment) The late Robert Kardashian has been a big inspiration to his children (Photo: WENN.com) 
She told fans: "My parents have always been very compassionate and giving. We were raised in a very blessed environment but since my dad grew up a lot less fortunate, it was really important to him to show us all realities of life and not let us be jaded by the life that he was so lucky to provide us. 
"At the same time, my dad always said to not be boastful about the charity work you do. Ask yourself if you are helping to benefit others or for a self-serving purpose. I hate when people throw their charity work in everyone’s faces because they are doing it for publicity or praise. I give to give. I don’t give to get." 
And the 32-year-old insists the amount someone gives isn't important but more about the act of doing so. She's been inspired by her mum Kris Jenner and late father Robert Kardashian (Photo: WireImage) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
